name: Curse Of Rhythm
description:
//This Game is My Submission to Ramadan Development Night's Jam:

//Story-Line

A Wizard made fun of a Hip-hop Witch one day.

Since the Witch Likes rough play.

she turns to the Wizard eager to say.

you'll live your life on replay.

move your feet on the beat.

You can't cheat that's obsolete.

Get every note, finish the music sheet.

Maybe Then you will know hip-hop is sweet.

//Controls

W,A,S,D: Move

Spacebar: Interact with objects

R: Restart level

//You Need To Know

It is very important to move or interact on clock ticks, or it will not register, its a bit forgiving not to ruin the experience. Have fun !
